Tangoe Mobile Procurement API

Tangoeâ€™s Mobile Procurement API is a RESTful API. With this next generation interface, our clients are able to:

  • Retrieve Inventory Information
    • Assets
    • Service Numbers
    • Contract Dates
  • Place procurement orders
    • New Activations
    • Upgrades
    • Ports
    • Suspend/Reconnect Service
    • Update Features
    • Deactivate Service
  • Retrieve Order Status
